title: The unnaturall combat A tragedie. The scæne Marsellis. Written by Philip Massinger. As it was presented by the Kings Majesties Servants at the Globe.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Crowne, in S. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
